heading: HB02648
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE REGISTRATION OF ALL PREPAID AND POSTPAID SUBSCRIBER IDENTITY MODULE (SIM) CARDS AND REQUIRING THE TELECOMMUNICATION COMPANIES TO KEEP A REGISTRY OF THESE SUBSCRIBERS AND PROVIDING FOR THE PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
